books.title: Who Moved My Cheese?
books.author: Dr. Spencer Johnson
books.review: The world is always changing. Never let fear of change decide how you are going to live.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.review: About a boy who is determined to find and follow his purpose in life. Should be read at least two times. The underlining messages will sink in better the second time.

books.title: I am Zlatan
books.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic
books.review: Confidence and narcissism gives you the persistence to go for what you want and not stop until you achieve it.

books.title: Between A Rock And A Hard Place (127 hours)
books.author: Aron Rolston
books.review: Eyeopening and fascinating on what our body can do to survive. We can push ourselves beyond limits we never new existed.

books.title: The Dip
books.author: Seth Godin
books.review: Short book with mind-blowing content. Being number one will give you serious benefits. This book is a must read.

books.title: Scar Tissue
books.author: Anthony Keidis
books.review: Constant drug abuse in the first half of the book. The later half was a mix of in-and-out of rehab, song writing and girls. Too much shooting-up-coke-and-herion-by-him-self-in-a-hotel-room and too little crazy adventures with his band members.

books.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
books.author: Steven R. Covey

books.title: The Viking Manifesto
books.author: Steve Strid & Claes Andréassen
books.review: Forget marketing. Build the best product or service you can do, and the marketing will handle itself. And the better the story the less you have to spend on buying media.

books.title: Total Recall
books.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
books.review: This dude has some serious work ethic. Three careers. Became world-class in all of them. One of the best biographies I’ve read.

books.title: The Dirt
books.author: Neil Strauss
books.review: Entertaining biography about one of the biggest rock band in the 80s. Packed with crazy stories. Great read on 'how to learn to do whatever comes into your mind and not care about the consequences'.
